item.title: The 112th
item.description: Four years after Nancy Pelosi swore to end deficit spending, a new Congress, elected by a grassroots surge, took office today. Our work has just begun. But we have the momentum. Here’s how we need to deal with Congress: 1. We let them know what’s important to us. 2. We defend them—individually and collectively—when they do the right thing. 3. We remind them of their purpose, promises, and limitations when they stray.
